summary: Create a calm, trustworthy, clear German landing page for paarweg.com targeting couples from Zurich seeking online couples counseling/coaching, hosted at /paarberatung-zuerich and not linked in the main menu, with a CTA for an initial contact.
architectural_notes: Landing page should not be linked in the site menu; accessible only via direct URL (paarweg.com/paarberatung-zuerich).
Landing page copy/tone must match existing paarweg.com style; explicitly mention ZÃ¼rich while emphasizing the online, discreet nature of the offer.

existing_features.title: Create a new landing page route at `/paarberatung-zuerich` that renders a dedicated landing page for `paarweg.com/paarberatung-zuerich` (German copy), targeting couples from Zurich seeking online couples counseling/coaching, and ensure this page is reachable by direct URL.

Implement the landing page content and section structure with a calm, respectful, reflective tone (no hype), matching the existing `paarweg.com` style; explicitly mention Zurich clearly even though the service is online. Use the provided headline and subheadline verbatim.

Add a clear primary Call-to-Action on the landing page that invites visitors to request an initial non-binding first contact, using existing contact/booking options already used on the site (e.g., link to `/kontakt` and/or the existing Calendly URL).
Ensure the landing page is not linked from the main header navigation or mobile menu (no new entry added to the `navigation` list in `frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx`).

Add SEO metadata for `/paarberatung-zuerich` consistent with existing pages: set `document.title`, meta description, canonical URL (`https://www.paarweg.com/paarberatung-zuerich`), and Open Graph tags that reflect the Zurich-focused online service.
Update `frontend/public/sitemap.xml` to include `https://www.paarweg.com/paarberatung-zuerich` as an indexable URL entry (while still keeping it unlinked from the menu).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create German landing page at paarweg.com/paarberatung-zuerich for couples in Zurich seeking online Paarberatung/Paarcoaching; calm professional tone matching existing site; include specified sections and CTA; page should not be linked in the main menu.
